name: Garam Masala
properties: Contains warming spices like cinnamon, cardamom, cloves, cumin, coriander, black pepper
Rich in antioxidants from multiple spice compounds
May boost metabolism through thermogenic effects
Enhances flavor without added salt or fat
benefits: Provides concentrated antioxidant protection from multiple spices
May enhance thermogenesis and metabolic rate
Helps reduce sodium needs through rich flavor profile
synergies: Combines with turmeric in dal recipes for enhanced anti-inflammatory effects
Pairs with black lentils in traditional Indian dishes
Works with ginger and garlic in curry bases
Complements cayenne pepper for additional heat and metabolism boost
